Class BigNeo4jDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • Neo4jDatabase
      • BigNeo4jDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database

    public class BigNeo4jDatabase
extends Neo4jDatabase
    A Neo4j database object containing all methods needed to query the larger Neo4j database with tree structure.
    Author:
    Josh

    • Constructor Detail

      • BigNeo4jDatabase

        public BigNeo4jDatabase(java.lang.String year,
                        java.lang.String major1,
                        java.lang.String major2,
                        java.lang.String curriculum,
                        int[] marks)
        Create a BigNeo4j database object
        Parameters:
        year - The year the student is about to start, this affects the algorithms & nodes queried
        major1 - the user's primary major
        major2 - the user's secondary major
        curriculum - a String of the user's input courses
        marks - The user input marks which affect the LB and UB parameters of queries
